I'm Rias, a full stack web developer from Antwerp specialized in Laravel, Vue.js, Statamic & Craft CMS

A back-end developer at Spatie, freelancer in my spare time, co-organizer of Full Stack Belgium, developer of Jumpseat and a proud IMD alumnus

You can find me or my work on Github and Twitter, or just send me a quick email if you need to contact me!
